channel.title: CVE Feed for Trend Micro -- Trend Micro Apex One
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trend Micro -- Trend Micro Apex One

item.title: CVE-2021-36741|2024-08-04T01:01:59.373Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description: An improper input validation vulnerability in Trend Micro Apex One, Apex One as a Service, OfficeScan XG, and Worry-Free Business Security 10.0 SP1 allows a remote attached to upload arbitrary files on affected installations. Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to logon to the productï¿½s management console in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-36742|2024-08-04T01:01:59.398Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description: A improper input validation vulnerability in Trend Micro Apex One, Apex One as a Service, OfficeScan XG and Worry-Free Business Security 10.0 SP1 allows a local attacker to escalate privileges on affected installations. Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
